REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0737 reute r f BC-STARTEL-<STAS>-TO-HAV 04-07 0044

TEXT.TITLE: STARTEL <STAS> TO HAVE LOSS, SALES DROP
TEXT.BODY: StarTel Corp said it expects to report a first quartter loss on a 25 to 30 pct revenue fall from the year-earlier 2,524,000 dlrs. The company earned 64,000 dlrs in last year's first quarter. Reuter
